SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Client
Represents a patient in the system.
ClientHandler
Handles communication with a single connected client on the server side.
ClientManager
Manages persistence and retrieval operations for the Client entity in the database.
CommandProcessor
Server-side class responsible for processing and responding to all incoming client commands
CommandType
Contains all commands used in the clientâ€“server communication protocol.
Doctor
Represents a doctor in the system.
DoctorAssignmentService
Service used to select the most suitable doctor for a patient based on the type of signal being recorded (ECG, EMG, etc.).
DoctorManager
Manages persistence and retrieval operations for the Doctor entity and related client assignments in the database.
DoctorSpecialty
Lists the medical specialties available in the system.
JDBCClient
Implementation of the ClientManager interface using JDBC (Java Database Connectivity) for client data persistence in the database.
JDBCConnectionManager
Manages the connection to the SQLite database
JDBCDoctor
Implementation of the DoctorManager interface using JDBC for managing Doctor and associated Client data persistence in the database.
JDBCMedicalHistory
Implementation of the MedicalHistoryManager interface using JDBC for managing persistence operations related to medical history records in the database
JDBCSignal
Implementation of the SignalManager interface using JDBC for managing persistence operations related to signal records in the database.
JDBCUser
Implementation of the UserManager interface using JDBC for managing user persistence in the database.
MainServer
Clase principal que inicializa y arranca el servidor de LungLink
MedicalHistory
Represents a single medical history record for a patient.
MedicalHistoryManager
Manages persistence and retrieval operations for the MedicalHistory entity and handles core business logic related to medical records and doctor assignments.
ReceiveDataViaNetwork
Handles incoming data from a client or server over a TCP socket connection.
SecurityUtils
Utility class providing simple security-related operations, such as hashing passwords using MD5.
SendDataViaNetwork
Class used to send different types of data (int, String, byte[]) through a socket connection.
ServerConnection
Handles the functionality of the server socket and manages all client connections.
ServerUI
Console-based interface that allows the server administrator to check active connections and stop the server when needed.
Sex
Represents the biological sex of a patient.
Signal
Represents a physiological signal (ECG, EMG...) recorded from a patient.
SignalManager
Manages persistence and retrieval operations for the Signal entity in the database, including complex lookups by client and medical record.
TypeSignal
Types of physiological signals supported by the system.
UIUtils
Utility class used to safely read user input from the console.
User
Represents a user account in the system, storing login credentials and the internal user ID.
UserManager
Manages persistence and authentication operations for the User entity in the database.
